page.title: 15Dialect words in Oakley
page.content:
Here are some dialect words heard in Buckinghamshire.Many are thought to have come about because yokels have misheard or misread a word and so passed it on incorrectly.
baryard .......two sticks on a cart bellus ........to bustle about blizzy ........a blazing fire brevit ........to fidget caggle ........to argue bodger ........a man who makes chairs glibby ........slippery mammer ........to confuse chibble .......to gnaw clats .........cattle dung cotchel .......part-filled corn sack cribbling .....lame dilling .......the smallest in a litter tiggle ........to move slowly dungle ........compost heap
